hero.title: Management Improvement Plans
hero.description: Comprehensive management improvement plans to enhance managerial and operational capabilities before and after IPO, ensuring your company meets public company standards and regulatory requirements.

objectives.title: Purpose of Management Improvement Plans
objectives.description: Our MIP aims to enhance your company's management capabilities and governance standards to meet public company expectations.

items.title: Enhance Managerial & Operational Capabilities
items.description: Improve managerial and operational capabilities of the company before and after IPO to meet public company standards.

items.title: Demonstrate Reliable Leadership
items.description: Show investors that the company has reliable and competent leadership team for sustainable growth.

items.title: Align Management Structure
items.description: Adjust management structure to comply with public company standards and regulatory requirements.

components.title: Main Components in Management Improvement Plans
components.description: Our comprehensive MIP covers five critical areas to ensure your management team is ready for public company responsibilities.

items.title: Management Training & Strengthening
items: GCG (Good Corporate Governance) training for directors and commissioners
Public financial reporting and investor communication training
Professional competency certification by field (e.g., CFA, CPA, GRC)

items.title: Organizational Restructuring
items: Adjust structure for greater transparency and efficiency
Separate strategic vs operational functions (clearer command lines)
Establish internal committees: Audit Committee, Risk Committee, Remuneration Committee

items.title: Key Human Resources Recruitment & Strengthening
items: Recruit experienced professionals in finance, legal, and investor relations
Add positions like Chief Risk Officer, Corporate Secretary, Head of Compliance

items.title: Implementation of Good Corporate Governance (GCG)
items: Align practices with GCG guidelines from OJK and BEI
Implement transparency policies, whistleblowing, and gratification control

items.title: Enhancement of Internal Control Systems & Risk Management
items: Evaluate effectiveness of internal control systems (SPI)
Regular internal audits and reporting to board of directors

process.title: Management Improvement Process in IPO
process.description: Our systematic approach ensures comprehensive management enhancement and governance strengthening for IPO readiness.

steps.title: Current Management Capability Assessment
steps.description: Comprehensive evaluation of existing management capabilities, organizational structure, and governance practices.

steps.title: Identify Competency & Structure Needs
steps.description: Identify gaps in competencies and structural requirements needed for public company compliance.

steps.title: Training & Recruitment Planning
steps.description: Develop comprehensive training programs and strategic recruitment plans for key positions.

steps.title: GCG Structure & Committee Implementation
steps.description: Establish proper corporate governance structure and implement required committees and policies.

steps.title: Internal Control System Testing
steps.description: Test and validate the effectiveness of internal control systems and risk management frameworks.

steps.title: Review & Finalization by IPO Consultants
steps.description: Final review and validation by IPO consultants to ensure full compliance with regulatory requirements.

items.title: New & Functional Organizational Structure
items.description: Updated organizational chart with clear roles, responsibilities, and reporting lines for public company operations.

items.title: GCG Policy & Procedure Documentation
items.description: Comprehensive documentation of corporate governance policies, procedures, and board manual.

items.title: Management Training & Certification Reports
items.description: Documentation of completed training programs and professional certifications for key management personnel.

items.title: Internal Audit & Risk Management Evaluation Results
items.description: Assessment reports on internal control systems and risk management framework effectiveness.

items.title: Improved GCG Assessment Score
items.description: Enhanced corporate governance assessment score as evaluated by independent parties for regulatory compliance.

benefits.title: Strategic Benefits
items: Enhance investor confidence in management quality and governance standards
Increase competitive advantage and corporate reputation in the market
Ensure readiness to fulfill reporting obligations and information disclosure post-IPO

cta.title: Ready to Enhance Your Management Team?
cta.description: Get comprehensive management improvement services to strengthen your leadership capabilities and governance standards for IPO success. Our expert team will guide you through every aspect of management enhancement.
